content: middle corner st work corner repeat pat around square join with slip_stitch to beg chain-3 repeat row 2 9 twice more round 3 chain 2 *half_double_crochet in each st to corner in corner repeat row 2 6 once more do not attach work 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet repeat from * around color b in round 6 square join with slip_stitch to beg chain-2 finish off weave in ends block pattern note the remaining section of the pattern is worked in rounds copyright - this stained glass square pattern & photo are copyright 2012 by melinda miller free for round 1 place stitch marker in live st to secure your own personal use only per copyright law do and weave in all ends remove stitch marker not redistribute with or without charge in any form place hk in live st work 2 single_crochet in same st 3 single_crochet are redistributing to others includes by photocopies now in same st corner made turn work 90 scanning emailing putting on a cd posting in internet forum messages putting on another web site degrees clockwise so that the left side is at the and any other manner of distribution top work single_crochet evenly spaced along side of square working 3 single_crochet in corner turn square 90 degrees clockwise so that the bottom is at the top work 1 single_crochet in each foundation chain to end of row work 3 single_crochet in corner turn square 90 degrees clockwise so that the other side is at the top work single_crochet evenly spaced along side of square work 3 single_crochet in corner turn square 90 degrees clockwise so that the top is now righted work 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet across row join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet
